register.name: CSR
register.description: Low Power Timer Control Status Register

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: LPTMR is disabled and internal logic is reset.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: LPTMR is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TMS_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Time Counter mode.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TMS_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Pulse Counter mode.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TFC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: CNR is reset whenever TCF is set.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TFC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: CNR is reset on overflow.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TPP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Pulse Counter input source is active-high, and the CNR will increment on the rising-edge.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TPP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Pulse Counter input source is active-low, and the CNR will increment on the falling-edge.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TPS_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Pulse counter input 0 is selected.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TPS_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Pulse counter input 1 is selected.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TPS_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Pulse counter input 2 is selected.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TPS_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Pulse counter input 3 is selected.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TIE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Timer interrupt disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TIE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Timer interrupt enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TCF_0b0
bit_field_value.description: The value of CNR is not equal to CMR and increments.

bit_field_value.name: CSR_TCF_0b1
bit_field_value.description: The value of CNR is equal to CMR and increments.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PCS_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler/glitch filter clock 0 selected.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PCS_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler/glitch filter clock 1 selected.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PCS_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler/glitch filter clock 2 selected.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PCS_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler/glitch filter clock 3 selected.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PBYP_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler/glitch filter is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PBYP_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler/glitch filter is bypassed.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b0000
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 2; glitch filter does not support this configuration.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b0001
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 4; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 2 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b0010
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 8; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 4 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b0011
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 16; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 8 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b0100
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 32; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 16 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b0101
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 64; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 32 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b0110
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 128; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 64 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b0111
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 256; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 128 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b1000
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 512; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 256 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b1001
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 1024; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 512 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b1010
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 2048; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 1024 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b1011
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 4096; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 2048 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b1100
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 8192; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 4096 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b1101
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 16,384; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 8192 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b1110
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 32,768; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 16,384 rising clock edges.

bit_field_value.name: PSR_PRESCALE_0b1111
bit_field_value.description: Prescaler divides the prescaler clock by 65,536; glitch filter recognizes change on input pin after 32,768 rising clock edges.
